00044 class tx_servicemgr_pi3 extends tx_servicemgr {

00058     function main($content,$conf)   {
00059         $this->conf=$conf;
00060         $this->pi_setPiVarDefaults();
00061 
00062         $this->tx_init();
00063         $this->tx_loadLL();
00064 
00065         //DEBUG-CONFIG
00066         $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->debugOutput = true;
00067         
00068         $this->piVars['eventId'] = intVal($this->piVars['eventId']);
00069 
00070         switch ($this->piVars['action']) {
00071             CASE 'detail':
00072                 $content = $this->detailView($this->piVars['eventId']);
00073                 break;
00074 
00075             CASE 'uploadform':
00076                 $content = $this->showUpload($this->piVars['eventId']);
00077                 break;
00078 
00079             CASE 'doupload':
00080                 $content = $this->doUpload($this->piVars['eventId']);
00081                 break;
00082 
00083             CASE 'list':
00084             default:
00085                 $content = $this->listView();
00086         }
00087 
00088         return $this->pi_wrapInBaseClass($content);
00089     }

00096     function listView() {
00097         //Template preparation
00098         #Subpart
00099         $subpart = $this->cObj->getSubpart($this->template,'###SERMONLISTADMIN###');
00100         #header row
00101         $headerrow = $this->cObj->getSubpart($subpart,'###HEADERROW###');
00102         #single row
00103         $singlerow = $this->cObj->getSubpart($subpart,'###ROW###');
00104 
00105         //substitue table header in template file
00106         $markerArray['###HDATE###'] = $this->pi_getLL('date');
00107         $markerArray['###HSUBJECT###'] = $this->pi_getLL('subject');
00108         $markerArray['###HSERIES###'] = $this->pi_getLL('series');
00109         $markerArray['###HAUDIOFILES###'] = $this->pi_getLL('audiofiles');
00110         $subpartArray['###HEADERROW###'] = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($headerrow,$markerArray);
00111 
00112         //get content from database
00113         $resEvent = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery(
00114             'uid, datetime, subject, series',   #select
00115             'tx_servicemgr_events', #from
00116             'hidden=0 and deleted=0 and public=1'  #where
00117         );
00118 
00119 
00120         //substitue table rows in template
00121         if ($resEvent) {
00122             while ($rowEvent=$GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($resEvent)) {
00123 
00124                 if (!empty($rowEvent['series'])) {
00125                     $resSeries = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery(
00126                         'name',   #select
00127                         'tx_servicemgr_series', #from
00128                         'uid='.$rowEvent['series'].' and hidden=0 and deleted=0'
00129                     );
00130                     $rowSeries=$GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($resSeries);
00131                     $rowEvent['series'] = $rowSeries['name'];
00132                 } else {
00133                     $rowEvent['series'] = '-';
00134                 }
00135 
00136                 $audioFiles = $this->getAudioFiles($rowEvent['uid']);
00137                 $rowEvent['audiofiles'] = '';
00138                 foreach ($audioFiles as $audioFile) {
00139                     $rowEvent['audiofiles'].=$audioFile['title'].'<br />';
00140                 }
00141 
00142                 $markerArray['###DATE###'] = date('d.m.Y', $rowEvent['datetime']);
00143                 $markerArray['###SUBJECT###'] = $this->tx_linkToPage(
00144                     $rowEvent['subject'],
00145                     $GLOBALS['TSFE']->id,
00146                     array(
00147                         $this->prefixId.'[eventId]'=>$rowEvent['uid'],
00148                         $this->prefixId.'[action]'=>'detail'
00149                     )
00150                 );
00151                 $markerArray['###SERIES###'] = $rowEvent['series'];
00152                 $markerArray['###AUDIOFILES###'] = $rowEvent['audiofiles'];
00153 
00154                 if (empty($rowEvent['audiofiles'])) {
00155                     $markerArray['###UPLOAD###'] = $this->cObj->typoLink(
00156                         '&gt;',
00157                         array(
00158                             'parameter' => $GLOBALS['TSFE']->id,
00159                             'addQueryString' => 1,
00160                             'addQueryString.' => array(
00161                                 'exclude' => 'cHash,no_cache',
00162                             ),
00163                             'additionalParams' => implode('&',array(
00164                                 '&no_cache=1',
00165                                 $this->prefixId.'[eventId]='.$rowEvent['uid'],
00166                                 $this->prefixId.'[action]=uploadform'
00167                             )),
00168                             'useCacheHash' => false,
00169                         )
00170                     ); 
00171                 } else {
00172                     $markerArray['###UPLOAD###'] = '';
00173                 }
00174                 $liste .= $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($singlerow,$markerArray);
00175             }
00176             $subpartArray['###ROW###']=$liste;
00177         }
00178 
00179         return $this->substituteMarkersAndSubparts($subpart,$markerArray,$subpartArray); ;
00180     }

00188     function detailView($eventId) {
00189         if (t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('audioplayer')) {
00190             require_once(t3lib_extMgm::extPath('audioplayer').'class.tx_audioplayer.php');
00191         } else {
00192             die('Extension "audioplayer" not loaded!');
00193         }
00194         $audioplayer = t3lib_div::makeInstance('tx_audioplayer');
00195         $audioplayer->init();
00196         $audioplayer->setOptions(array('initialvolume'=>'100'));
00197         return $audioplayer->getFlashPlayer('fileadmin/predigten/1-20080613-1.mp3');
00198     }

00207     function showUpload($eventId, $previousUploadData = array()) {
00208 
00209         //init template and set static labels
00210         $subpart = $this->cObj->getSubpart($this->template,'###SERMONUPLOADFORM###');
00211         $markerArray['###TITLE###'] = $this->pi_getLL('uploadTitle');
00212         $markerArray['###HSUBJECT###'] = $this->pi_getLL('subject');
00213         $markerArray['###HDATE###'] = $this->pi_getLL('date');
00214         $markerArray['###HTAGS###'] = $this->pi_getLL('tags');
00215 
00216         //get data out of database
00217         $singleEvent=$this->getSingleEvent($eventId);
00218         if ($singleEvent == false) {
00219             return $this->pi_getLL('ERROR.wrongEventKey').
00220                     $this->listView();
00221         }
00222 
00223         $allTags = $this->getTags();
00224 
00225         $duty = $this->getSingleSchedule($eventId);
00226         if ($duty === false) {
00227             return $this->pi_getLL('ERROR.wrongEventKey');
00228         }
00229 
00230         $allPreachers = $this->getTeamMembers($this->generalConf['PreacherTeamUID']); // get all teammembers of preacher-team
00231         
00232         if ($previousUploadData === array()) {
00233             $actTags = split(',', $singleEvent['tags']); // get tags for this event
00234             $actPreachers = $duty[$this->generalConf['PreacherTeamUID']]; // get preacher(s) for this event
00235         } else {
00236             $actTags = $previousUploadData['data']['tags'];
00237             $actPreachers = $previousUploadData['data']['preachers'];
00238         }
00239         
00240         // generate output
00241         $outputTags = '';
00242         foreach($allTags as $tag) {
00243             $outputTags .= '<input type="checkbox" value="'.$tag['uid'].'" name="'.$this->prefixId.'[upload][tags][]" id="tag_'.$tag['uid'].'"';
00244             if (is_array($actTags)) {
00245                 if (in_array($tag['uid'], $actTags)) {
00246                     $outputTags .= ' checked="checked"';
00247                 }
00248             }
00249             $outputTags .= '/><label for="tag_'.$tag['uid'].'">'.$tag['name'].'</label><br/>
00250             ';
00251         }
00252 
00253 
00254         // if atleast one person is in preacher-team
00255         if(count($allPreachers) !== 0) {
00256             
00257             if (!is_array($actPreachers) && empty($actPreachers)) {
00258                 $actPreachers = array();
00259             }
00260 
00261             // wrap preachers in select element
00262             $outputPreachers = '';
00263             if (count($actPreachers) > 1) {
00264                 $outputPreachers = '<select size="3" id="'.$this->prefixId.'[upload][preachers]" name="'.$this->prefixId.'[upload][preachers][]" multiple="multiple">
00265                 ';
00266             } else {
00267                 $outputPreachers = '<select size="1" id="'.$this->prefixId.'[upload][preachers]" name="'.$this->prefixId.'[upload][preachers][]">
00268                 ';
00269             }
00270 
00271             foreach ($allPreachers as $singlePreacher) {
00272                 $outputPreachers .= '<option value="'.$singlePreacher['uid'].'"';
00273                 if (in_array($singlePreacher['uid'], $actPreachers)){
00274                     $outputPreachers .= ' selected="selected"';
00275                 }
00276                 $outputPreachers .= '>'.$singlePreacher['name'].'</option>
00277                 ';
00278             }
00279             $outputPreachers .= '</select>';
00280         }
00281 
00282 
00283         //
00284         // File
00285         //
00286         $markerArray['###HFILE###'] = '<label for="'.$this->prefixId.'[upload][file]">'.$this->pi_getLL('file').'</label>';
00287         $markerArray['###FILE###'] = '<input name="'.$this->prefixId.'" id="'.$this->prefixId.'[upload][file]" type="file" size="30" />';
00288 
00289         //
00290         // combine output
00291         //
00292         $markerArray['###SUBJECT###'] = $singleEvent['subject'];
00293         $markerArray['###DATE###'] = date('d.m.Y - H:i', $singleEvent['datetime']).' h';
00294         $markerArray['###PREACHER###'] = '<label for="'.$this->prefixId.'[upload][preachers]">'.$this->pi_getLL('preacher').':</label>&nbsp;'.$outputPreachers;
00295         $markerArray['###TAGS###'] = $outputTags;
00296         $markerArray['###SUBMIT###'] = '<input type="submit" name="'.$this->prefixId.'[upload][submit]" value="'.$this->pi_getLL('submitform').'" />';
00297 
00298         $actionLink = $this->cObj->typoLink_URL(array(
00299             'parameter' => $GLOBALS['TSFE']->id,
00300             'addQueryString' => 1,
00301             'addQueryString.' => array(
00302                 'exclude' => 'cHash,no_cache',
00303             ),
00304             'additionalParams' => '&no_cache=1',
00305             'useCacheHash' => false,
00306         )); 
00307         
00308         $content = '<form name="'.$this->prefixId.'[upload]" action="'.$actionLink.'" method="post" enctype="multipart/form-data">';
00309         $content .= '<input type="hidden" name="'.$this->prefixId.'[action]" value="doupload" />';
00310         $content .= '<input type="hidden" name="'.$this->prefixId.'[eventId]" value="'.$eventId.'" />';
00311         $content .= $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($subpart,$markerArray);
00312         $content .= '</form>';
00313 
00314         return $content;
00315     }

00323     function doUpload($eventId) {
00324         $uploadData['file'] = $_FILES[$this->prefixId];
00325         $uploadData['data'] = $this->piVars['upload'];
00326         
00327         $uploadPath = $this->extConf['audioFileUploadPath'];
00328         
00329         // get data out of database
00330         $allPreachers = $this->getTeamMembers($this->generalConf['PreacherTeamUID']);
00331         $allSeries = $this->getSeries();
00332 
00333         if ($uploadData['file']['error'] == 0) {
00334             $uploadData['file']['extension'] = $this->fileExtension($uploadData['file']['name']);
00335 
00336             $allowedAudioType = str_replace(' ','',$this->extConf['allowedAudioType']);
00337             if (!in_array($uploadData['file']['extension'], split(',',$allowedAudioType))) {
00338                 return $this->throwErrorMsg($this->pi_getLL('wrongFileExtension')).
00339                         $this->showUpload($eventId, $uploadData);
00340             }
00341 
00342             //get single event from database
00343             $singleEvent=$this->getSingleEvent($eventId);
00344             if ($singleEvent == false) {
00345                 return $this->throwErrorMsg($this->pi_getLL('ERROR.wrongEventKey')).
00346                         $this->listView();
00347             }
00348 
00349             $countAudioPerEvent = $this->getAudiosPerEvent($eventId);
00350             $newFileName = $singleEvent['uid'].'-'.date('Ymd',$singleEvent['datetime']).'-'.$countAudioPerEvent.'.'.$uploadData['file']['extension'];
00351 
00352             if (!is_dir($uploadPath)) {
00353                 mkdir($uploadPath, null, true);
00354             }
00355 
00356             if (!move_uploaded_file($uploadData['file']['tmp_name'], PATH_site.$uploadPath.'/'.$newFileName)) {
00357                 return $this->throwErrorMsg($this->pi_getLL('error')).
00358                         $this->listView();
00359             }
00360 
00361             $tx_mp3class = t3lib_div::makeInstance('tx_servicemgr_mp3'); //initiate mp3-/id3-functions
00362 
00363             foreach ($uploadData['data']['preachers'] as $singlePreacher) {
00364                 $fileInformation['artist'][] = $allPreachers[$singlePreacher]['name'];
00365             }
00366             $fileInformation['album'] = $allSeries[$singleEvent['series']]['name'];
00367             $fileInformation['title'] = $singleEvent['subject'];
00368             $fileInformation['year'] = date('Y', $singleEvent['datetime']);
00369             $fileInformation['genre'] = $this->extConf['sermonGenre'];
00370 
00371             $tx_mp3class->setAudioInformation($uploadPath.'/'.$newFileName, $fileInformation); //write id3-tags to file
00372 
00373             $fileInformation = $tx_mp3class->getAudioInformation(PATH_site.$uploadPath.'/'.$newFileName); //get playtime, bitrate, etc.
00374             $title = $singleEvent['subject'];
00375             if ($countAudioPerEvent > 0) {
00376                 $title .= ($countAudioPerEvent + 1);
00377             }
00378             $actTime = mktime();
00379 
00380             $insertData = array(
00381                 'pid' => '2',
00382                 'tstamp' => $actTime,
00383                 'crdate' => $actTime,
00384                 'event' => $eventId,
00385                 'title' => $title,
00386                 'file' => $uploadPath.'/'.$newFileName,
00387                 'filedate' => filemtime(PATH_site.$uploadPath.'/'.$newFileName),
00388                 'playtime' => $fileInformation['playtime'],
00389                 'filesize' => $uploadData['file']['size'],
00390                 'mimetype' => $uploadData['file']['type'],
00391                 'bitrate' => $fileInformation['bitrate'],
00392                 'album' => $singleEvent['series']
00393             );
00394             $insertData['l18n_diffsource'] = serialize(array('title'=>'','event'=>'','file'=>''));
00395             $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_INSERTquery('tx_servicemgr_sermons', $insertData);
00396             $sermonUID = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_insert_id();
00397 
00398             // get schedule data for event
00399             $duty = $this->getSingleSchedule($eventId);
00400             if ($duty === false) {
00401                 return $this->throwErrorMsg($this->pi_getLL('ERROR.wrongEventKey')).
00402                         $this->listView();
00403             }
00404             $duty[$this->generalConf['PreacherTeamUID']] = $uploadData['data']['preachers'];
00405             
00406             $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_UPDATEquery(
00407                 'tx_servicemgr_dutyschedule', #table
00408                 'event='.$eventId, #WHERE
00409                 array('duty' => serialize($duty)) #data
00410             );
00411             
00412             $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_UPDATEquery(
00413                 'tx_servicemgr_events', #table
00414                 'uid='.$eventId, #WHERE
00415                 array('tags' => implode(',', $uploadData['data']['tags'])) #data
00416             );
00417             return $this->listView();
00418 
00419         } else {
00420             switch ($uploadData['file']['error']) {
00421                 CASE 1:
00422                 CASE 2:
00423                     return $this->throwErrorMsg($this->pi_getLL('ERROR.largeFile')).
00424                             $this->showUpload($eventId, $uploadData);
00425                     break;
00426                 CASE 3:
00427                     return $this->throwErrorMsg($this->pi_getLL('ERROR.brokenFile')).
00428                             $this->showUpload($eventId, $uploadData);
00429                     break;
00430                 CASE 4:
00431                     return $this->throwErrorMsg($this->pi_getLL('ERROR.noFile')).
00432                             $this->showUpload($eventId, $uploadData);
00433                     break;
00434 
00435                 DEFAULT:
00436                     return $this->throwErrorMsg($this->pi_getLL('error')).
00437                             $this->listView();
00438             }
00439         }
00440     }
